headline: Asian stocks in retreat as traders eye Fed decision, tech earnings
summary: Asian markets retreated Wednesday following a tepid day on Wall Street as investors bided their time ahead of a highly anticipated Federal Reserve policy announcement later in the day.With US central bankers expected to cut interest rates for the third straight session later Wednesday, the main focus is on their post-meeting statement, boss Jerome Powell's news conference and the "dot plot" forecast for 2026 policy.

content.title: Asian stocks in retreat as traders eye Fed decision, tech earnings
content.summary: Asian markets retreated Wednesday following a tepid day on Wall Street as investors bided their time ahead of a highly anticipated Federal Reserve policy announcement later in the day.With US central bankers expected to cut interest rates for the third straight session later Wednesday, the main focus is on their post-meeting statement, boss Jerome Powell's news conference and the "dot plot" forecast for 2026 policy.

thumbnail.caption: Traders are keeping tabs on earnings from tech giants Oracle and Broadcom this week (JUSTIN SULLIVAN)
